title: Dashboard Overview
description: Get familiar with the main dashboard and key metrics

steps.title: Welcome to CivicFlow2
steps.description: This interactive tour will guide you through the main features of the dashboard. You can navigate using the arrow keys or buttons below.

steps.title: Key Performance Metrics
steps.description: These cards show real-time statistics about applications, approvals, and funding. Watch them update as new activity occurs in demo mode.

steps.title: Total Applications
steps.description: Track the total number of applications submitted. This metric updates in real-time as new applications are received.

steps.title: Approval Rate
steps.description: Monitor your approval rate percentage. A healthy approval rate indicates efficient processing and quality applications.

steps.title: Recent Activity Feed
steps.description: Stay updated with the latest actions and events. This feed shows real-time updates including new applications, status changes, and approvals.

steps.title: Applications Trend Chart
steps.description: Visualize application trends over time. This chart helps you identify patterns and peak submission periods.

steps.title: Quick Actions
steps.description: Access frequently used actions quickly. Create new applications, run reports, or access settings from here.

steps.title: Main Navigation
steps.description: Use the navigation menu to access different sections: Applications, Documents, Reports, and Settings.

steps.title: Demo Mode Indicator
steps.description: This badge shows you're in demo mode. All data is simulated and safe to explore. You can toggle demo features in settings.

steps.title: Dashboard Tour Complete!
steps.description: You've completed the dashboard overview. Explore other walkthroughs to learn about application review, AI features, and admin tools.
